Topic.Title: The IF Comp 2017 games are already there and there's 79 of them

Posts.EditableText:
Hi People,

This year IF Comp is BIG. 79 games are available to play.

Who's in?

Who's going to judge the games?

This year there's a huge need for judges because of the amazing number of entries. Remember, you need only to play 5 or more games to become a judge.

Enjoy the adventures!

https://ifcomp.org/ballot/

Ruber Eaglenest.
